document.full_text: on financial disclosure forms, justice clarence thomas also said his wife, virginia, received 'salary and benefits' from a conservative group she founded with ties to the tea party movement.
document.title: sotomayor got $1.175 million for memoir, forms reveal
lines_and_colors: on financial disclosure forms, justice clarence thomas also said his wife, virginia, received 'salary and benefits' from a conservative group she founded with ties to the tea party movement.
